title: Shutdown Fullcast 40 for 40: The 2017 New Orleans Bowl
description:
You can do a fun run in the Superdome like nuclear winter already hit! You can buy clothing and drink out of it! The game might actually be good! Coolio! That's right, it's the first of many bite sized episodes previewing every dang bowl game, starting with the New Orleans Bowl. Please remember: these are hardly ever informative, even by Fullcast standards.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
